titles.title: Preventing the EPA from Garnishing Wages Act of 2014
To amend section 3720D of title 31, United States Code, to prohibit wage garnishment by the Environmental Protection Agency.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committee.subcommittee: Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Introduced. Preventing the EPA from Garnishing Wages Act of 2014 - Eliminates the authority of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to garnish wages for a debt owed under programs it administers.
